import React, {Component} from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import OwlCarousel from 'react-owl-carousel'; import 'owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.carousel.css'; import 'owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.theme.default.css'; import startersData from './Data'; import { useCart } from "react-use-cart"; const options = { margin: 30, responsiveClass: true, nav: true, autoplay: false, navText: ["Prev", "Next"], smartSpeed: 1000, responsive: { 0: { items: 1, }, 400: { items: 1, }, 600: { items: 2, }, 700: { items: 3, }, 1000: { items: 3, } }, }; function Home() { const { addItem } = useCart(); console.warn(startersData); return(
